roleset.name: teeming, abundant

example.name: both args
example.text: The history of technology is rife with stories and accounts of revolutionary approaches overturning the status quo.
example.arg: with stories and accounts of revolutionary approaches overturning the status quo

example.name: arg2
example.text: Youth unemployment is rife at the moment so let 's get them piloting our aeroplanes .

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-2,3.
